name: HYPERSPHERE
description:
Hyperdimensional Series 

Unravel the multidimensional universe by accessing this interactive generative art experiment. 

In this experiment you can access the different layers and perspectives of a multidimensional universe.

Interactive generative art animation created especially for the Hic Et Nunc platform.

Controls: 
click, drag and drop to rotate objects 
scroll or pinch to zoom
Best viewed on desktop with chrome browser

Created by Zydron and part of the development process of this work was broadcast live to the youtube, twich, twitter and facebook platforms on October 08 and 09, 2021. Access at: https://linktr.ee/calebavlab
